RestFB library 1.6.2 API

RestFB is a simple and flexible Facebook Graph API and Old REST API client.

See:
          Description

Packages
com.restfb Contains types used to interact with the Facebook Graph API and the Legacy Facebook REST API.
com.restfb.exception Contains exceptions that RestFB may throw while attempting to communicate with the Facebook API endpoints.
com.restfb.json Repackaging of the json.org reference implementation.
com.restfb.types Default implementations of Facebook Graph API Objects.
com.restfb.util Contains utility classes which provide common String, Date, and Reflection operations.

 

RestFB is a simple and flexible Facebook Graph API and Old REST API client.

For detailed documentation and usage examples, please visit http://restfb.com.
